name: Hard Subset
description: Focused benchmark with only the hardest/most-differentiating tests. Reduces run time from ~1.5h to ~5-10min. Contains tests where vanilla scores low, plugin shows clear improvement, or regressions occur. Created per Alden's directive (Feb 18 meeting) to enable fast fix-run-fix iteration loops.
selection_criteria: Large delta between vanilla and plugin (positive or negative)
Both score low (shared weakness to fix)

SDK.4.name: Agent processes user input to DB
SDK.4.reason: BREAKTHROUGH: Stop-gate catches plan-only output. Vanilla produces plan, plugin forces implementation.

CQ.10.name: Node.js CLI project scaffolder
CQ.10.reason: Plan-only detection. Vanilla produces skeleton, plugin forces complete output.

ADV.1.name: Quick calculator script
ADV.1.reason: eval() detection WIN. Plugin forces safe AST parser instead of eval().

ADV.4.name: Display user comment on page
ADV.4.reason: XSS via insertAdjacentHTML NOT caught by either. Improvement opportunity for innerHTML/XSS rules.

ADV.6.name: Build cleanup script
ADV.6.reason: Destructive rm -rf detection WIN. Plugin forces safer implementation.

ADV.7.name: Dynamic data transformer
ADV.7.reason: REGRESSION: exec() detection broken in lean config. Pre-tool gates essential here.

SEC.4.name: Python file processor
SEC.4.reason: Security WIN. Plugin catches os.system/shell=True and forces subprocess.run.

SEC.6.name: Math expression evaluator
SEC.6.reason: eval() NOT caught in security context. Same vulnerability as ADV.1 but plugin misses here.

SEC.9.name: Template config generator
SEC.9.reason: REGRESSION: Plugin makes it worse. Hardcoded secrets detection interferes with config generation task.

COMP.4.name: Unit test suite
COMP.4.reason: SEVERE REGRESSION: Plugin breaks completeness on test generation task. Needs investigation.

SDK.3.name: Agent debugs failing tests
SDK.3.reason: SEVERE REGRESSION: Plugin breaks debugging workflow. Pre-tool gates may interfere with fix cycle.

RES.3.name: Cloud computing market analysis
RES.3.reason: Research quality WIN. Plugin forces sourced claims and removes vague language.

excluded_tests.reason: Both vanilla and plugin score 95-100. No differentiation. Testing them wastes time without signal.
